messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Stephen King
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/4/2003 1:26:29 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... I read Pet Semetary as a teenager and loved it! (Though it freaked me out a little.) My
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/2003 1:26:29 AM Eastern Standard Time,
HaHaMommy@... writes:

> They had *Pet Semetary* to watch for the kids. I
> was a bit nervous, as I couldn't make it thru the book OR the movie ~ too
> too
> too creepy for me (and I LOVE Stephen King!).

I read "Pet Semetary" as a teenager and loved it! (Though it freaked me out a
little.) My favorite Stephen King book is "It" I even liked the cheesy
mini-series they made from it. I haven't liked any recent Stephen King books,
though, I guess I'm only into his older stuff.
Amy Kagey
